alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:27PM EDT until March 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WAKULLA AND SOUTH CENTRAL LEON COUNTIES... At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Vereen, Plum Orchard, Port Leon, Bethel and Natural Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
